message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. I'm only offering it to you because I think you'll really appreciate its value. If you buy it, you'll be getting an exceptional item that will meet your needs and exceed your expectations.

I'd like to buy it, but I have to ask, are you sure you're selling it for $10000? That's the price you mentioned, but I'm not sure if you're just trying to make a sale or if you really believe in its value.

I'm glad you're interested in the product! I can assure you that I'm not trying to make a sale at any cost. I'm a reputable seller, and I want to make sure you're happy with your purchase.
